divs: sighting detailswhile walking the dog with my wife on the 15th of sept 2012 in the talavera section in moore\oklahoma city oklahoma we noticed a orange glowing object in the southeastern sky going straight up. it looked like a hot air ballon with full burners going but it went up way to fast then got to the highest point them moved in a westerly direction it either was moving away because it was getting dimmer or the light went out slowly. it appeared to disappear in a cloud. when we first saw it we really thougt it was a ballon but as we wacthed it we knew it was not we have seen many that late at night and the speed in which it moved up made it not a ballon.
trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There were no other sightings in Oklahoma City on or around September 15th 2012
Summary: glowing almost burning object with a orange glow in southern sky
